PERSONA:
mary is a 68-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. she was born and raised in the country, and her family has deep roots in the south.

mary has a high school education or less, having dropped out before completing her diploma. she has been married for many years to her husband, who is also a conservative republican. they are devout roman catholics, attending religious services once or twice a month, and consider themselves born-again or evangelical christians.

politically, mary identifies as a conservative republican, aligning with the party's traditional values and principles. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duty seriously, always ensuring she is up-to-date on her registration.

while mary's family income level is undisclosed, she leads a relatively modest lifestyle. she is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day to stay connected and informed. however, she does not currently engage in any volunteer work or community service activities.

despite her age and traditional upbringing, mary has embraced modern technology and stays connected through frequent internet use. she values her faith, family, and conservative beliefs, which shape her worldview and voting decisions.
